about_the_game:
Cute Growth-Based Othello

"Dog vs Cat Othello" is an adorable Othello game where you battle with your favorite dog or cat characters.

New Element: Evolve Your Own Pieces

Adding a new twist to the traditional Othello rules, characters evolve and earn points with each flipped stone, making old strategies obsolete! Creating high-scoring characters can lead to dramatic turnarounds!

Strategically flip your opponent's stones and dominate the board with your evolved characters.

Local Two-Player Mode Available

Play not only solo but also locally with friends.

Play and Unlock Various Characters

Defeat numerous CPUs to unlock new characters and use a variety of characters.


Recommended For:
Those who love Othello or Reversi but find it becoming repetitive.
Those who want to play with designs that elevate the excitement beyond just black and white stones.
Those who adore dogs and cats.
Those looking for a new twist on board games.

Future Plans:
・Online multiplayer
・New characters
・New game features

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 32-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel High Definition Audio

short_description: Cute Growth-Based OthelloA growth-based Othello game featuring cute dog and cat characters. Flip your opponent's character and evolve my character into stronger one! Playable in both single-player and local two-player modes.
